name: Famed Explorer of the Robot World
name_original: Famed Explorer of the Robot World
description:
You are an explorer in search of fame and glory.  You land on a world inhabited by dangerous robots.  Will your name go down in history, or will you be forgotten on this alien world?

Gameplay

Famed Explorer of the Robot World is a 3D action-adventure game where you choose a path across a field of 36 levels.  Most levels have two possible exits, meaning that you won't see every level in one play through.

You can freely rotate the camera around the entirety of each level, trying to find the best path through the 3D environments. 

Controls:

WASD - Move
Mouse - Rotate Camera
LMB - Shoot
Shift - Lock-On
Space/Esc - Pause and View Map
M - Mute

VERSION 0.9 - The game is mostly complete but may still have some issues, and has some missing sound effects.  If you run into an issue, please comment below and I'll try to fix it in the next version.
